TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SourceChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class SourceChangedEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class SourceChangedEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

summary.span: 为 SourceChanged 事件提供数据以用于互操作。

span.span: Provides data for the SourceChanged event, used for interoperation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SourceChanged 事件是路由的事件的事件标识符未公开。The SourceChanged event is a routed event where the event identifier is not publicly exposed. 这是因为此事件在互操作中扮演潜在的严重的一部分，不应允许以任意一个已知的内部实现之外的任何其他源引发子类 (目前，只有这样的类是).This is because this event plays a potentially critical part in interoperation and should not be allowed to be raised arbitrarily by any other source than the internal implementation of a known subclass (currently, the only such class is ). 在实现互操作解决方案时，可以将附加或删除的事件处理程序 (通过调用和分别) 但不能执行其他操作通常可用于路由事件，例如类处理添加所有者，或从引发事件的任意元素源。When implementing an interoperation solution, you can attach or remove handlers for the event (by calling and , respectively) but you cannot perform other operations normally available to routed events such as class handling, adding owners, or raising the event from an arbitrary element source. 此类重写虚方法，以便在返回的事件系统请求的特定于类型的处理程序。This class overrides the virtual method , in order to return a type-specific handler when requested by the event system. 这在此类成员表中未显示重写[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)]文档因为它是由一个密封类实现的受保护的成员。This override does not appear in the class members table in this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_sdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-sdk-md.md)] documentation because it is a protected member implemented by a sealed class.
